AfricanTrailsExped.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1-2       Ashnil Samburu Camp     Luxury tented camp bordering Samburu NR without fences     All Meals Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              All Meals Included       3       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       4       Sarova Lion Hill Game Lodge     Luxury lodge inside Lake Nakuru NP     All Meals Included                   +6 Photos          +5 Photos              All Meals Included       5-6       Ashnil Mara Camp     Luxury tented camp inside Masai Mara NR     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       7      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast Included           Breakfast Included
AfricanTrailsExped.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees
AfricanTrailsExped.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
